Ms. KAPTUR. Mr. Speaker, as co-chair of the House Great Lakes Task  Force, I rise today to speak on behalf of our Great Lakes region.

My part of it is the Ninth District of Ohio that stretches all the  way from Bryan, Ohio, all the way across the northern part of Ohio  through Toledo, all the way to Sandusky and down to Fremont, Ohio,  passing…
